table.caption: Lords' Alliance Renown
rows: Nobles from Amphail, Daggerford, and Yartar are {@variantrule Friendly [Attitude]|XPHB|Friendly} to you by default.

While in an alliance settlement whose nobles are Friendly to you by default, you can buy potions and {@item Spell Scroll|XDMG|Spell Scrolls} from an alliance quartermaster at a 10 percent discount. A Spell Scroll bought with this discount can contain a spell of level 3 or lower.
The first time your Renown Score reaches 10, your lord gives you one random Uncommon magic item.
Nobles from Longsaddle, Mirabar, and Neverwinter are Friendly to you by default.
In any Lords' Alliance settlement, you can enlist a spellcaster to cast the {@spell Sending|XPHB} spell for you at no charge, targeting an alliance representative.
Nobles from Baldur's Gate, Mithral Hall, Silverymoon, and Waterdeep are Friendly to you by default.
The first time your Renown Score reaches 40, your lord gives you one random Rare magic item.

You can request an audience with any representative of the Lords' Alliance. In addition, you can request a detail of up to three {@creature Knight|XMM|Knights} to accompany you for one mission. Once you use this reward, you can't do so again until your Renown Score increases.
table.name: Lords' Alliance Renown
